europeana:record.dc:title: Braueria 28 (2001)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anonym H.O., Anonym , Ceccagnoli Donatella, Chantaramongkol Porntip, Cheunbarn Siraporn, Chiappafreddo Umberto, Cianficconi Fernanda, Di Giovanni Maria Vittoria, Goretti Enzo, Ivanov Vladimir D., Malicky Hans, Nimmo Andrew P., Resh Vincent, Saengpradab Narumon, Sipahiler Füsun, Tanida Kazumi, Wiggins Glenn B.
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Hans Malicky: Dear Trichopterologist 3- 4. Kazumi Tanida: 11th International Symposium on Trichoptera, Osaka (Japan) - First announcement and call for preliminary registration 5. Fernanda Cianficconi: A new subspecies of Athripsodes taounate (Trichoptera: Leptoceridae) from Sicily 6. Glenn B. Wiggins: Construction behavior for new pupal cases by casemaking caddis larvae: Further comment. (Trichoptera: Integripalpia). 7- 9. Hans Malicky: Reply to Wiggins by H. Malicky 9. Vincent Resh, Andrew P. Nimmo: Which journals contain the most articles on Trichoptera ? 10. Hans Malicky, Porntip Chantaramongkol, Siraporn Cheunbarn, Narumon Saengpradab: Einige neue Köcherfliegen (Trichoptera) aus Thailand (Arbeit Nr. 32 über thailändische Köcherfliegen) 11- 14. Anonym: List of research workers on Trichoptera 14. Maria Vittoria Di Giovanni, Enzo Goretti, Umberto Chiappafreddo, Donatella Ceccagnoli: Preliminary results on the biometry of Italian Trichoptera fauna 15- 18. Hans Malicky: Notes on the taxonomy of Rhadicoleptus, Ptilocolepus and Pseudoneureclipsis. 19- 20. Hans Malicky: Moretti Collection in Bergamo 20. Hans Malicky: News from Mara Marinkovic 20. Füsun Sipahiler: Three new species and new records of Trichoptera from Turkey and Spain (Philopotamidae, Beraeidae, Leptoceridae) 21- 23. Füsun Sipahiler: Discontinuous dimorphism in males of Hydropsyche kinzelbachi (Trichoptera, Hydropsychidae) 23. Vladimir D. Ivanov: Russian bibliography 24- 30. Anonym: Trichopterological Literature 31- 39. H.O. Anonym: Caddisflies on stamps 39
